sn55.43:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.43:1.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.43:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
sn55.43:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro punnabhisanda kusalabhisanda sukhassahara.
sn55.43:4.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi punnabhisandehi kusalabhisandehi samannagatassa ariyasavakassa na sukaram punnassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.43:4.3: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahapunnakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati”ti.
